title: Conservation Incentives Program Act of 1995
content: Conservation Incentives Program Act of 1995 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out a conservation incentives program to provide technical assistance, cost-sharing payments, and incentive payments to participating agricultural operators. Establishes a special rule and funding obligations for livestock operations. Establishes program and land priorities. Sets forth: (1) duties of the operators and of the Secretary. And (2) eligible land categories. Funds such program through the Commodity Credit Corporation.
